comments.text: Hey Genna! I've been such a huge fan of you, your patterns and creations and I just want to thank you for helping your crochet community out and sharing tips on how to make your small business successful. I'm a student, I love crocheting and I've always wanted to sell my products, but I never knew where to start. These tips have really helped me narrow down the most important aspects to starting a small side business and I hope you know that so many people appreciate this more than anything. Keep it up <3

comments.text: Hey Genna! I have been a big fan of crochet for a long time. I have had a lot of fun watching your videos while I crochet. You have inspired me to start trying to make plushies since I wasn't big on that. I wanted to ask if you would try making the crochet plushie of the Mushroom Guy? I have seen many people make it and I would love to see your version of it😊 (I'm also trying to make it) If you see this, thank you for all the inspiration you have given me. Love your channel and watching your videos while I crochet. Have a good day!
